GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article based on the specified id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments belonging to the article at the specified id, with most recent first

exampleResponse.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves a new comment posted to the specified article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article based on the specified id, with an updated vote count

exampleResponse.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars

DELETE /api/articles/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment based on specified comment_id
